---
name: Custom issue template
about: 'This template helps define user stories for new features or improvements. '
title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

Acceptance Criteria 1: Clearly describe the condition that needs to be met for the feature to be considered complete. Example: "The user can add items to the cart and view them in a 'Cart' section."

Acceptance Criteria 2: Describe another condition that defines the desired outcome. Example: "The user receives a confirmation message when the cart is successfully updated."

Acceptance Criteria 3: Another condition or scenario to test the feature's completeness. Example: "The user can proceed to checkout with items in the cart."
